sentence.Network_en: The one thousand pound bomb was triggered by a wire.
sentence.Network_cn: 那颗重达1,000磅的炸弹是由一根导线引爆的。

sentence.Network_en: I ripped out the telephone wire that ran through to his office.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把通到他办公室的电话线拔掉了。

sentence.Network_en: A youth was inside the car, attempting to hot-wire it.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个小青年正在车里试图用电线短路的方法发动汽车。
